meanings.definition: The act or process of making films.
meanings.sent1: Filmmakings require creativity and technical skills.
meanings.sent2: She studied filmmakings in college and now works in the industry.
meanings.sent3: The classroom was filled with excitement as the students learned about filmmakings.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a canvas, and filmmakings were her paintbrush.
meanings.sent5: The magic of filmmakings brought stories to life on the screen.

meanings.definition: The occupation or profession of making films.
meanings.sent1: Many people dream of a career in filmmakings.
meanings.sent2: He found success in the world of filmmakings after years of hard work.
meanings.sent3: The town celebrated its local hero in the field of filmmakings.
meanings.sent4: In the kingdom of filmmakings, she was a queen of storytelling.
meanings.sent5: His dedication to filmmakings earned him respect among his peers.
